title: Run Mplus within Rstudio (addin)
text: Addin Rstudio allowing run Mplus code within RStudio (Mplus license installed Mplus required).

title: Run Mplus within Rstudio (addin)
text: Run installation done, find four commands RStudio Addins menu header “MPLUS.RSTUDIO” (need load library).

title: Run Mplus within Rstudio (addin)
text: Run Mplus Open Mplus input file (make sure active, , just click code), click “Run Mplus” run. ’s running, try setting path Mplus executable file, command refers . click “Run Mplus” saves input file, running code, automatically opens output file. can see progess console. Run Mplus Job Run Mplus instead send task Background Jobs, can still use RStudio (including starting Mplus models) current Mplus process executed. find especially handy , fact, use default. NB! Add shortcuts make running Mplus even handy: Go Tools -> Modify Keyboard Shortcuts, find “Run Mplus” “Run Mplus Job” assign custom shortcut (example, use Control+R Mac). Set Mplus path Tell RStudio find Mplus executable file. default just “mplus” cases works. doesn’t, use command set , stored within current R project globally work outside project. Create Mplus input command creates template code new analysis, saves data.frame Mplus-compatible format, opens code RStudio.
